thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Sylvester Tan

author: Sylvester Tan
title: Sylvester Tan
text:
We are a small business first established into Melbourne in May 2016. From the get go, we have received nothing but exemplary, caring and professional services from the front office team, management and Servcorp support staffer. This has helped us to continue to grow and focus on our customers, projects and revenue. I have worked with two of the dedicated personal assistants that impressed my customers, and even helped to win sales through their confidence, personality and overall style.
Servcorp Docklands is a small business environment, yet they have done their best consistently above any larger serviced office organizations.
Our company owed them the gratitude for what we have accomplished, and looked forward to a successful partnership with Servcorp Docklands.
We would have incurred huge expenses trying to set up a similar business structure, quality professional services and experiences for our customers.
